story.title: The spirit of
story.paragraph: In Sakai, Japan, master swordsmiths reinvented themselves when the era of the samurai ended. They transformed their centuries-old craft into a new form of excellence, becoming the world's leading makers of precision kitchen knives. That same spirit of mastery and reinvention inspires our work.
story.masteryDesc: Deep expertise built through years of hands-on experience in engineering, architecture, and systems design.
story.reinventionDesc: The ability to rethink processes, modernize systems, and integrate AI in ways that unlock new possibilities.
story.excellenceDesc: Delivering reliable, scalable, and elegant solutions that bring real business impact.
story.quote: We carry the spirit of Sakai into every project, combining technical precision with the vision to reinvent complex systems and build AI-powered solutions that truly matter.
header.title: Sakai Intelligence
header.subtitle: Precision technology, real impact
contact.title: Let's build something exceptional
contact.subtitle: From AI integrations to full-stack engineering, we design solutions that help companies move faster, scale smarter, and operate with clarity. Tell us what you need and we will help you shape the right strategy.
contact.nameMax: Name must be less than 100 characters
contact.emailMax: Email must be less than 255 characters
contact.companyMax: Company name must be less than 100 characters
contact.messageMax: Message must be less than 1000 characters
contact.sentDesc: Thank you. We will reply shortly to explore how we can help.
contact.errorDesc: Something went wrong and your message couldn't be sent. Please try again in a moment.
contact.errorMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again.
footer.title: Sakai Intelligence
footer.desc: AI integration and software engineering crafted with clarity, precision, and impact.
services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: We help companies modernize, optimize, and scale through expert engineering and intelligent automation.
services.readiness.title: AI Readiness & Opportunity Assessment
services.readiness.desc: A fast discovery engagement (1â€“3 weeks) analysing systems, data, security and workflows to identify high-ROI AI use cases.
services.integrations.title: Enterprise AI Integrations
services.integrations.desc: Embed AI capabilities into existing systems (CRM, ERP, intranet, customer portals) without replatforming.
services.rag.title: RAG & Knowledge Automation Systems
services.rag.desc: Deploy retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) over internal documents, policies, contracts, and support knowledge bases.
services.agents.title: AI Workflow Automation & Agents
services.agents.desc: Design and implement custom AI agents that automate tasks across tools (email, Jira, Salesforce, SAP, APIs).
services.document.title: Document Intelligence & Data Extraction
services.document.desc: AI solutions for reading, classifying, and extracting structured data from PDFs, invoices, contracts, forms, and logs.
services.security.title: AI Security, Governance & Productionisation
services.security.desc: Build safe, compliant, production-ready AI systems with guardrails, auditability, monitoring, and cloud best practices.
services.aiIntegrationDesc: Bring real value to your products and workflows by integrating reliable, production-ready AI, from LLMs to custom ML models.
services.softwareDevDesc: We design and build robust, scalable software solutions tailored to your business logic, operational needs, and long-term vision.
services.processAutoDesc: Replace repetitive manual tasks with automated workflows that reduce errors, accelerate delivery, and cut operational costs.
services.apiDevDesc: Well-designed APIs that connect your systems, simplify integrations, and support future growth without architectural friction.
services.dataEngDesc: We build reliable data pipelines and infrastructure that turn raw data into insights and insights into decisions.
services.techConsultDesc: From architectural guidance to modernization strategy, we help engineering teams make the right technical decisions at the right time.
hero.subtitle: We help businesses integrate AI, modernize their systems, and build reliable software designed for long-term growth.
studio.hero.subtitle: We help founders turn ideas into market-ready products through technical expertise, strategic guidance, and hands-on execution. Build your MVP, launch confidently, and scale sustainably.
studio.offer.title: What we offer
studio.offer.subtitle: End-to-end support from concept to market launch and beyond.
studio.benefits.mvp.title: MVP Development
studio.benefits.mvp.desc: We design and build your minimum viable product with speed and precision, using proven architecture and modern tech stacks.
studio.benefits.launch.title: Go-to-Market Strategy
studio.benefits.launch.desc: Launch with confidence. We help you validate assumptions, define positioning, and build the right product for your market.
studio.benefits.coaching.title: Founder Coaching
studio.benefits.coaching.desc: Get strategic guidance on product, technology, and execution from experienced technical and business leaders.
studio.benefits.ownership.title: You Own Everything
studio.benefits.ownership.desc: Full IP ownership stays with you. We are here to help you succeed, not to take equity or control.
studio.process.title: How it works
studio.process.subtitle: A structured, proven process designed to get you from idea to launch fast.
studio.process.discovery.title: Discovery & Strategy
studio.process.discovery.desc: We start by understanding your vision, market, and goals. Together, we define the MVP scope, technical architecture, and go-to-market approach.
studio.process.build.title: Design & Build
studio.process.build.desc: Our team designs and develops your product using agile methodologies. You stay involved through regular demos and feedback cycles.
studio.process.launch.title: Launch & Validation
studio.process.launch.desc: We help you launch to real users, measure what matters, and iterate based on feedback and data.
studio.process.scale.title: Scale & Optimize
studio.process.scale.desc: Post-launch, we continue to support you with optimization, new features, and technical guidance as you grow.
studio.why.title: Why Sakai Studio
studio.why.expertise.title: Deep Technical Expertise
studio.why.expertise.desc: Decades of combined experience building scalable systems, AI products, and enterprise software.
studio.why.speed.title: Speed to Market
studio.why.speed.desc: We move fast without compromising quality. Get your MVP live in weeks, not months.
studio.why.partnership.title: True Partnership
studio.why.partnership.desc: We are invested in your success. You get dedicated support, honest feedback, and strategic guidance.
studio.why.rights.title: Your IP, Your Business
studio.why.rights.desc: You retain 100% ownership of your intellectual property and business. No equity, no hidden terms.
studio.cta.title: Ready to build your startup?
studio.cta.subtitle: Tell us about your idea and let's explore how Sakai Studio can help you launch successfully.
